formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: There is little support for the uint4_t in compilers, so we should remove its use from the array and the compiler output. This will simplify the definition of the compiler in the shared object runtime. This will fix the compiler failure in building this shared object.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: This will require some changes to the Software Architecture and subsequently to the CoDfns.dyalog namespace, which will have to adjust its use of the int4 type in various places. Other than this, it is not used elsewhere and will not affect other documents.
